page.title: 19PERIVALE MATERNITY HOSPITAL
page.content: The hospital has about 100 beds and several hundred staff are connected with it. Various methods of childbirth are used,eg. Le Boyeur's method, active childbirth for which there is a specially made birthday bed. Caesarian and vaginal births are both considered although the latter is encouraged. Breast feeding is also encouraged in the hospital rather than bottle feeding. Counselling and lessons constituting exercises and advice on labour are given regularly before the birth to the mother to help her decide which method would suit her best, and to teach her how to cope with the labour and baby after it is born. High technology and low technology birth are both available but the latter, more natural method is encouraged. Naresh Chaudan
